titles.title: There's A Great And Mighty Army

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There's a great and mighty army
In the earth today, dressed in splendid armor,
Preparing for the fray. The hosts of darkness
Tremble as they march away.
There's a great and mighty army
In the earth today.
So let's shout the shout of victory!
The enemy is under our feet.
Let us shout the shout of victory!
For great is our King,
Great is our King, great is our King.
